title: Yevhen Rudakov club
text:
Yevhen Rudakov club () is an unofficial list of <a href="Soviet%20Union">Soviet</a> and <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeepers</a> that have achieved 100 or more <a href="clean%20sheet">clean sheet</a>s during their professional career in top Soviet and Ukrainian league, cup, European cups, national team and foreign league and cup. This club is named after the first Soviet (Ukrainian) goalkeeper to achieve 100 clean sheets - <a href="Yevhen%20Rudakov">Yevhen Rudakov</a>.
Which clean sheets are counted.
Traditionally, counted goals and clean sheets in the following matches:
